---
title: Sign the Delegate Transaction
slug: /staking/cardano/delegate/sign-delegate-transaction
---

Sign the deposit transaction using the `transaction_payload` you received in response to submitting the deposit data.

Locate the `transaction_payload` in the response from the previous step. It will look something like this:

```json
"transaction_payload": ""
```

:::caution important

Always confirm the details of the transaction before signing the payload.

:::

Transactions can also be signed using the [Cardano CLI](https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-node/blob/master/doc/reference/building-and-signing-tx.md) or offline signing tools such as Input|Output&apos;s [Jormungandr](https://input-output-hk.github.io/jormungandr/jcli/transaction.html).

Sign the transaction and move on to the next step. A signed transaction payload for Cardano will look something like this:

```text

```
